description.en:
Minho dated a tall girl in high school. The girl told Minho that he doesn’t appeal to her as a man because he’s too short. Since then, Minho hated tall girls. One day, Minam Han, a tall and slow-witted girl, appears in front of him. At first, Minho hates her, but little by little, he is attracted to Minam. However, Minam introduces Hyerin to Minho.

---

- [Official English Translation <INKR>](https://inkr.com/title/605-the-distance-between-us)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/a-la-hauteur)
description.fr:
Minam est tombée amoureuse de Minho lorsqu’ils étaient en primaire. A l’époque, c’était une enfant petite et timide, que Minho, le plus grand de l’école, n’avait pas peur de protéger. Mais aujourd’hui, tout a changé ! Alors qu’ils se retrouvent à la fac, Minam est devenue une étudiante charismatique et androgyne, tandis que Minho, le bon élève taciturne, n’a pas grandi d’un pouce. Rajoutez à ça un triangle amoureux, des graphismes adorables ainsi qu’une bonne dose de gags, et vous obtenez la comédie romantique la plus mignonne du webtoon !

---

- [Official English Translation <INKR>](https://inkr.com/title/605-the-distance-between-us)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/a-la-hauteur)
description.ko:
어렸을 적 자신을 도와주었던 민호를 짝사랑 하던 한미남. 
그러나 민호는 전학을 가게 되고 한미남의 짝사랑은 끝나는 줄 알았지만, 대학교에서 운명적인 만남을 하게 되는데...?! 키 빼면 완벽한 그<놈?>들의 눈높이를 초월한 로맨스!

---

- [Official English Translation <INKR>](https://inkr.com/title/605-the-distance-between-us)
